title: Yasou Skin Idea
body:
I have an idea for a Yasou skin, but i'm not a great drawer so ill describe it

Demioic Yasou

Q- He trusts his sword out, if it is hit by a target, a demon head marks the target
Qx3- The Tornado leaves a lava trail, and screams can be heard
W- Wall Is Basically Red
E- Yasou Dashes To target, and the 7 second dash timer is red
R- Yasou blinks to target, Hovers above taget as they are airborn, 3 demons arise, does the attack, and fades away

Riot if you read this, i hope it would be a 975 skin, i think it a really good idea{{sticker:slayer-jinx-wink}}

replies.body: this sounds more like a legendary skin, which would cost 1350 or 1820
Agreed, I mean it sounds pretty high quality if it was made.
